Mechanically the game is great.  Saucer can't be destroyed -- hitting saucer center now locks balls for multi-ball only.  Scoop shots trigger missing ball cycle on machine and eventually kicks it out without scoring/stroke of luck/etc.  Seems to be a board issue at this point, but it doesn't play/score correctly.  Still fun, though.

Back up and running 50 cents for 3 ball play or $2 for 5 credits plunger is still stiff and play field still dirty. The ball lock carry over problem still hasn‚Äôt been fixed. VERY short ball save, and slightly tight tilt. Replay has been raised to 12 million points and the match system is less generous. And the volume has been turned down. Kinda disappointed really, I was hoping the game would be more playable after it got repaired. Probably won‚Äôt be going back.
Out of order, the screen says ‚Äúopen the door‚Äù. I think the bank door is broken.

Replaced the Avatar. 50 cents for 3 ball play. Machine in playable condition. The playfield could use cleaning and the plunger could use a rebuild. 

The biggest problem with the machine is that the ball locks aren‚Äôt working right. the locked balls don‚Äôt get ejected after the game ends. Instead, they carry over to the next game and the machine doesn‚Äôt realize the locked balls from the previous game are still in the lock. If you get all three of them in the lock then you have to wait about 15 seconds for the ball search to eject them out. 

But on the plus side, the replay is at an easy 3 million points. And the Match system is pretty generous. Gave me about 3 to 4 matches from the 12 games I played. Its a good machine to play if you gotta kill 15 minutes of your time, but don‚Äôt come for any serious play because of the malfunctioning ball locks.

50 cents for 3 ball play. Machine in playable condition, although this particular machine is a brutally difficult example. The free ride bulb is burned out making it hard to tell when it‚Äôs on. The auto plunger is weak, and it‚Äôs unable to make the full loop to the upper flipper. VERY tight tilt. The kickback doesn‚Äôt relight on a a new ball and the top post of the right outlane has sunken completely into the wood making easer to drain. Replay is at 18 million points , and the second replay is 25 million points. Be prepared. This machine will kick your ass.

Machine in playable condition, the plunger is a little weak, the free ride bulb is burned out making it hard to tell when it‚Äôs active. And the top of the right outlane post is sunken into the wood making it easier to drain But everything else works great. The replay is pretty approachable, it‚Äôs a good players machine.

machine_conditions.comment: Plays great!

50 cents for 3 ball play. The ring funnel broke off its housing and it‚Äôs floating around in the play-field above the orc rollovers. there was a ball already stuck in the funnel when I played it and when my ball hit the funnel, the trapped ball was freed and when one of them drained the bonus got collected and killed the other ball. The funnel also trapped my ball 3 times and it became a really annoying problem. I let the bartender know and she said would text the guy who maintains the games. Replay at 35 million.

50 cents for 3 ball play. The sound is turned back on and is up pretty loud. Only the middle coin slot registers quarters, the other two slots will eat them. Gollum cave VUK is a little sluggish, tight tilt, short ball save, replay at at 34 million.

50 cents for 3 ball play, everything seemed to work fine. But the sound was turned completely off, so no music or callouts.
Replay at 39 million.

50 cents for 3 ball play the plunger is now pretty much completely shot. The auto plunger is also really weak. It was unable to make the shot up the ramp to the roulette wheel. When I got multi-ball 2 balls went into the shooter lane and I couldn‚Äôt plunge them, Completely unplayable. don‚Äôt waste your time or your quarters.

50 cents for 3 ball play, pretty clean and well maintained. volume is turned up pretty loud so you can hear everything nice and clear. It has a very generous ball save 
(around 30 to 45 seconds!) everything seems work as it should. However the plunger is weak its strong enough to get the ball to the roulette wheel, but not enough to spin around it. Finally, the replay is at an astronomically high 1,660,000,000 points. For reference, that‚Äôs just below the grand champion for the machine. So don‚Äôt expect any replays unless your a true wizard.
